article_title: A district manager was sacked after he got caught peeing in sink of Pizza Hut
article_text:
This shameful incident of peeing in sink of Pizza Hut by district manager came from the Kermit, West Virginia, US.

Advertisement

According to the report, this district manager is now been sacked after he got caught peeing in the sink of kitchen on CCTV camera of Pizza Hut.

After this shameful incident the Pizza Hut branch was forced to shut off by the Mingo County health officials.

The Italian food chain are apparently “embarrassed” by the actions of the employee, and reiterated their “zero tolerance” approach to such matters in a statement.

Later this CCTV footage was uploaded on YouTube where it got tons of hits.
